Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 05/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
